name: MeMyself&I_SerDissalot
description:
Long ago, when the Tudors ruled the Land,
lived a man that no one could stand.
Ser Diss-a-Lot ofDissington was his name,
and putting people in  their place was his game.
But one day he saw some delusional nobles,
Jumping on their high horses, looking for troubles.
They started babbling about how great they were,
and Diss-a-Lot knew: He ought to end their career.
